content: welcome
hello

Welcome to ME209x Thermodynamics!

The course has started in studio.edge. Very soon it will be released officially.

Welcome to ME209.1x Thermodynamics course!


The courseware is released on January 01, 2017 (at 06:30 UTC).
To get help with the course, click the Discussion tab and post a question. To get help with a technical problem, click Support to send a message to edX Student Support.



Please check the Important Dates tab for the course deadlines. If this is not your first edX course, if you have enrolled and studied some other edX course earlier, then you may skip the rest of this message. If, on the other hand, this happens to be the first edX course you are enrolled in, then you should enrol yourself in the following course


Click the button to enroll in edXDEMO101: DemoX edX Demonstration Course  



This course is available any time, and you will need to spend no more than an hour in it.So, spend an hour (or more) in edXDEMO101 and be well prepared to experience ME209.1x.
The first section of course will be released on 29th July 2014 at 12:00 noon (IST) , (convert it to your timezone)

Week 2: Updates

The courseware for Week 2 will be released on Tue August 05, 2014 at 06:30 UTC. The deadline for quizzes in this week will be Mon August 18, 2014, 06:30 UTC.

This week, a set of exercises (Set A) will be released. Please read the instructions before attempting the exercises and the quiz thereafter. Some questions in that quiz are based on the exercises which precede it.

Please look up the new calendar - it is already uploaded.

You will also be expected to fill up the Entrance Survey before the same deadline.

Week 3: Updates

The courseware for Week 3 will be released on Tuesday, August 12, 2014 at 06:30 UTC. The deadline for quizzes in this week will be Monday, August 25, 2014, 06:30 UTC.

If you have not filled up the Entrance Survey, then please do it now.The deadline for that is Monday, August 18, 06:30 UTC.

Week 4: Updates

The courseware for Week 4 will be released on Tuesday, August 19, 2014 at 06:30 UTC.

Please note that this week, at many places, there are more than one video in the same unit. Please look up the pinned discussion "Why do the videos not show up in the bar on the top?"

Henceforth, Quizzes may not be released on the first day of the week. This week, the quizzes will be released three days later on Friday,August 22, 2014 at 06:30 UTC. The deadline for these quizzes will be Monday, September 1, 2014, 06:30 UTC.

Reason: We find that a number of students rush to the quizzes without studying the required material (videos, etc.).

Students should not discuss/reveal the final answers to the exercises. Some of these will be needed for the quizzes. Please read 5. Collaboration Guidelines, and 6. Forum Guidelines in the Course Handouts.

Week 5: Updates

The instructor for this week and the next is Prof. Milind Atrey.

The courseware for Week 5 will be released on Tuesday, August 26, 2014 at 06:30 UTC. The deadline for quizzes in this week will be Monday, September 08, 2014, 06:30 UTC.

Steam Tables are also being released. You will find them in the Course Handouts as Item 8.

This week, at many places, there are more than one video in the same unit. Please look up the pinned discussion "Why do the videos not show up in the bar on the top?"

This week, quizzes are released along with the courseware.

Students should not discuss/reveal the final answers to the exercises.
Please read 5. Collaboration Guidelines, and 6. Forum Guidelines in the Course Handouts.

Solutions for Exercises Set A are uploaded. Please see Week 2.

Week 6: Updates

The instructor for this week is Prof. Milind Atrey.

The courseware for Week 6 will be released on Tuesday, September 02, 2014 at 06:30 UTC. The deadline for quizzes in this week will be Monday, September 15, 2014, 06:30 UTC.

This week, at many places, there are more than one video in the same unit. Please look up the pinned discussion "Why do the videos not show up in the bar on the top?"

Corrections in Quizzes. In a few hours, we will make corrections to Problems 3, 11 in Quiz 15A, and to Problems 1, 5, 6, and 7 in Quiz 16B. You will get additional attempts for these problems.

Students should not discuss/reveal the final answers to the exercises.
Please read 5. Collaboration Guidelines, and 6. Forum Guidelines in the Course Handouts.

Week 7: Updates

We are back with Professor Gaitonde from this week. We are now halfway through our course, and are about to begin the exploration of the Second Law of Thermodynamics.

The courseware for Week 7 will be released on Tuesday, September 09, 2014 at 06:30 UTC.

Quizzes will be released on Friday, September 12, 2014, 06:30 UTC. The deadline for quizzes in this week will be Monday, September 22, 2014, 06:30 UTC.

This week, at many places, there are more than one video in the same unit. Please look up the pinned discussion "Why do the videos not show up in the bar on the top?"

Week 8: Updates

The courseware for Week 8 will be released on Tuesday, September 16, 2014 at 06:30 UTC.

Quizzes will be released on Friday, September 19, 2014, 06:30 UTC. The deadline for quizzes in this week will be Monday, September 29, 2014, 06:30 UTC.

This week, at many places, there are more than one video in the same unit. Please look up the pinned discussion "Why do the videos not show up in the bar on the top?"

Solutions for Exercises Set B are uploaded. Please see Week 4.

Week 9: Updates

The courseware for Week 9 will be released on Tuesday, September 23, 2014, at 06:30 UTC.

Quizzes will be released on Friday, September 26,2014, 06:30 UTC. The deadline for quizzes in this week will be Monday, October 06, 2014, 06:30 UTC.

This week, at many places, there are more than one video in the same unit. Please look up the pinned discussion "Why do the videos not show up in the bar on the top?"

Week 10: Updates

The courseware for Week 10 will be released on Tuesday, September 30,2014 at 06:30 UTC.

Quizzes will be released on Friday, October 03,2014, 06:30 UTC. The deadline for quizzes in this week will be Monday, October 13, 2014, 06:30 UTC.

This week, at a few places, there are more than one video in the same unit. Please look up the pinned discussion "Why do the videos not show up in the bar on the top?"

Professor Gaitonde completes his lectures this week. The instructor for the last two weeks of this course will be Professor Bhandarkar.

Solutions for Exercises Set C-1 are uploaded. Please see Week 4.

Week 11: Updates

The courseware for Week 11 will be released on Tuesday, October 07,2014 at 06:30 UTC.

Quizzes will be released on Friday, October 10,2014, 6:30 UTC. The deadline for quizzes in this week will be Monday, October 20, 2014, 06:30 UTC.

The instructor for this week and the next week is Professor Bhandarkar.

Solutions for Exercises Set C-3 are uploaded. Please see Week 6.

Paperwork of Professor Gaitonde

The paperwork of Professor Gaitonde is uploaded as scans of his handwritten pages.
Please look up at the end of Weeks 2, 4, 9, and 10.

Professor Atrey has already made his slides available.

The paperwork of Professor Bhandarkar may also be uploaded after a few days.

Week 12: Updates

The instructor for this week is Professor Bhandarkar.

The courseware for Week 12 will be released on Tuesday, October 12, 2014 at 06:30 UTC.

There will not be any quiz this week. However, the Final Examination begins on Friday, October 17, 2014 at 06:30 UTC. The deadline for the Final Examination is Wednesday, October 22, 2014, at 06:30 UTC.

An update for the final examination will be posted before it commences.

Updates

Week 12 courseware is uploaded

You will be able to download the video for Exercise 8 – Throttling Calorimeter in some time.

Final Examination : Updates

Please look up the details of the Final Examination.

Item 9 in the Course Handouts.

Paperwork of Professor Bhandarkar

The paperwork of Professor Bhandarkar is uploaded as scans of his handwritten pages.

Please look up at the end of Week 12.

Final Examination

The Final Examination is scheduled to begin soon, at 06:30 UTC on Friday, 17 October 2014.
The deadline is 06:30 UTC on Wednesday, 22 October 2014.
Please convert to your local time zone.
The deadline will not be extended.

There is only one attempt allowed in the final examination.
If you accidentally submit your answer, there is no way it can be undone.

Read the Course Handout: 9. Final Examination on the Course Info page.

The registration of new students will be suspended when the Final Examination begins.

Certificates

The Final Examination will be over on Wednesday, 22 October 2014 at 06:30 UTC. The preparation of certificates for those eligible will begin after that.

All students are advised to double-check their "Full Name" on their student dashboard, as that is what will appear on their certificates. Certificates cannot be reissued or altered after generation. Complete this check by Saturday, 25 October 2014, 06:30 UTC.

Successful students should expect will see a certicate download link on their dashboard on Monday, 03 November 2014.

Exit Survey and Course Review

Please fill up the Exit Survey. A link to this appears at the bottom left of the Courseware Page.

You are also encouraged to write a review about the course in the course registration page on edx.org via the CourseTalk feature.

Certicates Ready

The scores are computed, and certificates (for those eligible) are ready. Please look up your edX dashboard.


Exit Survey

Please fill up the Exit Survey till Monday, 10 November 2014.


What next?

From Monday, 17 November 2014, the course will be available as a self-paced course on the audit track. Registration will be opened.
